com.esri.mo2.ui.src
Class SimpleContentFilter.FeatureClasses

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.ui.src.SimpleContentFilter

        +--com.esri.mo2.ui.src.SimpleContentFilter.FeatureClasses
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentFilter
Enclosing class:
SimpleContentFilter
public static class SimpleContentFilter.FeatureClasses
extends SimpleContentFilter

this implementation of ContentFilter is preset to accept only FeatureClass objects. Using the following code, a ContentChooser will display only objects that are of type FeatureClass:

            ContentFilter filter = new simpleContentFilter.FeatureClasses();
            Content content[] = ContentChooser.addChoosableContentFilter(filter);
